content: Do not deviate from the plan - if deviations needed, STOP and ask user
Convert 2 format! calls in bevy_shutdown.rs to use error builders
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after bevy_shutdown.rs changes
Convert 2 format! calls in watch_response.rs to use error builders
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after watch_response.rs changes
Convert 1 format! call in watch_task.rs to use error builders
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after watch_task.rs changes
Convert 1 format! call in format_discovery/engine.rs to use error builders
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after engine.rs changes
Run cargo clippy with strict settings
If test issues found, STOP and review with user
Task subagent for final code review to confirm 100% completion
